manifest.install:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_wxz_payment_fans` ( `uid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `is_admin` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否是管理员,0否,1是', PRIMARY KEY (`uid`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_wxz_payment_payrecord` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '微信', `uid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID', `openid` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'openid', `fee` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '支付金额', `created` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `pay_time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '支付时间', KEY `id` (`id`), KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='支付记录表';
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wxz_payment_fans`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_wxz_payment_payrecord`;
